com.composum.sling.nodes.mount.remote

    Package Description
    com.composum.sling.nodes.mount.remote  
  • Classes in com.composum.sling.nodes.mount.remote used by com.composum.sling.nodes.mount.remote 
    Class Description
    RemoteClientBuilder
    a service interface for extending the building of the remote HTTP client
    RemoteClientSetup  
    RemoteProvider
    A remote resource provider enables the mounting of a remote Sling system via HTTP based on the JSON data rendered by default Sling GET servlet.
    RemoteProvider.Config  
    RemoteProxyBuilder.Config  
    RemoteReader
    reads the resource data using default Sling GET servlet JSON requests
    RemoteResolver
    the resolver of the remote Sling instance resources mounted by the resource provider; supports extended CRUD operations for resource ordering and file uploads (updates)
    RemoteResource  
    RemoteWriter  
    RemoteWriter.ChangeSet  
    RemoteWriter.Parameters
    for simplified request parameter setup
    RemoteWriter.ResourceChange  
    RemoteWriter.ResourceModify
